documentation.text:
@title WorkLobStaking
 @dev A staking contract where users can stake tokens to earn rewards.

@dev Constructor sets the ERC20 token used for staking and rewards.
 @param _token The ERC20 token address.
@dev Returns the last time reward was applicable (current time or period finish, whichever is lower).
@dev Calculates the current reward per token accumulated.

@dev Returns the total rewards earned by an account.
 @param account The address of the staker.

@dev Updates the reward variables for an account.
 @param account The address to update rewards for.

@dev Stake a specific amount of tokens.
 @param amount The number of tokens to stake.

@dev Withdraw staked tokens.
 @param amount The number of tokens to withdraw.
@dev Withdraw staked tokens and claim rewards.

devdoc.details: A staking contract where users can stake tokens to earn rewards.

constructor.details: Constructor sets the ERC20 token used for staking and rewards.

earned(address).details: Returns the total rewards earned by an account.

exit().details: Withdraw staked tokens and claim rewards.

lastTimeRewardApplicable().details: Returns the last time reward was applicable (current time or period finish, whichever is lower).

notifyRewardAmount(uint256,uint256).details: Owner-funded reward deposit. The owner (platform treasury) can deposit reward tokens to fund the reward pool. If the current reward period is still active, any leftover rewards are added.

params.duration: The duration (in seconds) over which to distribute the rewards.
params.rewardAmount: The total reward tokens to be distributed.

rewardPerToken().details: Calculates the current reward per token accumulated.

stake(uint256).details: Stake a specific amount of tokens.

params.amount: The number of tokens to stake.
The number of tokens to withdraw.
